titleStmt.title: Some observations on the remarks upon the Quakers, or, The busie priest's envy detected and folly manifested and his poor ability for his languishing-church proved ineffectual.
titleStmt.author: Field, John, 1652-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing, NUC pre-1956 imprints to John Field.
Signed at end: by one that is called a Quaker.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
